Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: <unk19:D0FF1FC822E00C80>
Entry.EnglishText: <unk19:D0FF1FC822E00C80>

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の人
Entry.EnglishText: Woman

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサス
Entry.EnglishText: Belsas

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサス
Entry.EnglishText: Belsas

Entry.JapaneseText: 道具屋
Entry.EnglishText: Item Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: クルルルゥ……
Entry.EnglishText: Coo Coo

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、召使い！ ご主人様のために、 よく働くんだぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, you there, servant! Make sure to work hard for your master, alright?

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマの召使いは便利だけど、 仕事が終わったらすぐに部屋から 出さないといけないよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I know that having Gajuma servants are handy, but you mustn't let them out when you don't need them.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマとヒューマは 別世界に住むべきだからね。 あまり、街の中で連れ歩かない ほうがいいよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Gajuma and Huma live in different worlds, after all. It's better if you don't take one with you outside.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマの召使いって、 なかなかイイのがいないんだよね。 文句を言ったり、不器用だったり。
Entry.EnglishText: Gajuma are not very good servants. They usually just complain or are clumsy.

Entry.JapaneseText: キミのガジュマはどうだい？ デカイ割にはおとなしそうで いいなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: How about yours? He seems quiet for someone so big. How nice...

Entry.JapaneseText: おっ、キミ…… なかなか使えそうな ガジュマを持ってるね。
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, you. You seem to have a handy Gajuma with you.

Entry.JapaneseText: どこで見つけて来たんだい？ 僕に譲ってくれないかな？
Entry.EnglishText: Where'd you find them? Or maybe you can just sell him to me.

Entry.JapaneseText: こんなところで道草食ってると、 スカラベさんに大目玉食らうぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: If you even think of eating on the grass here, Lord Scarabe will definitely give you an earful..

Entry.JapaneseText: ずいぶん身なりのいいガジュマだな。 こんなガジュマを雇えるのは スカラベさんぐらいだな……
Entry.EnglishText: What an elegantly dressed Gajuma... Must be one of Lord Scarabe's.

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、逃げて来たんじゃ ないだろうな？ お使いなら、早いとこ 用を済ませて帰れよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, I hope you're not thinking of running away. You should hurry on back to your master once you finish his errands.

Entry.JapaneseText: お連れの娘、キミの恋人かい？ スカラベさんとこのスージーも キレイだけど、彼女もいいネ！
Entry.EnglishText: That girl you're with, is she your lover? Lord Scarabe's daughter, Susie is pretty, but your girl is too!

Entry.JapaneseText: 性格も大事だけどさ、 やっぱり顔や見た目って ムシできないよね。
Entry.EnglishText: Of course, a person's character is important, but you can't really put a price on appearance.

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、スカラベさんに 何かあったら、おまえたち ガジュマは大変な事になるぞ。 覚えとけよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Keep this in mind, Gajuma. If anything happens to Lord Scarabe, you'll be in big trouble!

Entry.JapaneseText: なんか、ガジュマたちが スカラベさんの家のほうに 勢いこんで向かったそうだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Those Gajuma seem to have gone to Lord Scarabe's house for some reason.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマの連中、 何考えてるんだ……？
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder what they're planning?

Entry.JapaneseText: おいおまえ、ガジュマたちが 何を考えてるのか、聞いてないか？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, you! Do you have any idea what those Gajuma are planning?

Entry.JapaneseText: 何か知ってるなら、今のうちに スカラベさんに伝えたほうがいいぞ。 後で泣きたくなかったらな。
Entry.EnglishText: If you know something, then you should tell Lord Scarabe immediately. Unless you want to be crying later.

Entry.JapaneseText: スカラベさんが明日、 ガジュマたちと話し合いを するとか言ってるんだってね。
Entry.EnglishText: Apparently, Lord Scarabe agreed to hold a discussion with the Gajuma tomorrow.

Entry.JapaneseText: 信じられないなぁ…… ガジュマ嫌いのあの人が、 話し合いなんて……
Entry.EnglishText: I can't believe it... That person, who hates Gajuma, holding a discussion...

Entry.JapaneseText: なあ、あれは本当に女王様なのか？ どうして女王様が、スカラベさんに 連れられて来たんだよ……！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, was that girl really the Queen? Don't you think it's strange?

Entry.JapaneseText: そんなの変だと思わないか？
Entry.EnglishText: Why would Lord Scarabe bring her here?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……スカラベさんが ガジュマ嫌いなのは 知ってたけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I knew Lord Scarabe hated Gajuma, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: まさか、女王様を殺そうと するなんて……信じられないよ。 スージー、大丈夫かな……
Entry.EnglishText: To think that he'd even dare to kill Her Highness... I wonder if Susie's alright...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマとガジュマが 仲間として旅をするなんて…… あんたの仲間、変だよな……
Entry.EnglishText: Huma and Gajuma traveling together... Your group is weird.

Entry.JapaneseText: 軍のお達しで、ガジュマを召使いに するのは禁止になったよ…… あんたのは……仲間だったな……
Entry.EnglishText: The army did announce that Gajuma servants are forbidden now... So that guy is your... companion...

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえはどういうつもりで、 ヒューマと旅をしてるんだ？ おまえはヒューマが憎くないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: What do you intend to do, traveling with Huma? Don't you hate them?

Entry.JapaneseText: 本当かウソか知らんが、 この先の民家に住むマウロは 海賊アイフリードの末えいなんだと。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't know if this is true or not, but apparently a guy named Mauro who lives around here, was Aifread's descendant.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>幻の島<White>とか、海賊のお宝とか、 そういう話なら、マウロに 聞いてみたらどうかな？
Entry.EnglishText: Why not ask him about this <Blue>Island of Illusions<White>, or pirate treasure or whatever?

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえはどういうつもりで、 ヒューマと旅をしてるんだ？ おまえはヒューマが憎くないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: What do you intend to do, traveling with Huma? Don't you hate them?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ジルバ様の演説以来、 ガジュマたちが日に日に 偉そうになってるよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Ever since Lady Zilva gave her speech, those Gajuma have slowly grown more arrogant...

Entry.JapaneseText: あいつら、そのうち国を乗っ取って、 僕たちヒューマを召使いにするかも しれないよ……くそっ……
Entry.EnglishText: If this country ends up following what she said... We Huma might end up becoming servants instead...! Damn...

Entry.JapaneseText: ちゃんと、ご主人様たちの 言う事を聞けよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Make sure to listen to what your owner tells you, alright?

Entry.JapaneseText: いいガジュマを使ってるね。 見た目は抜群だし、 使い勝手もよさそうだね。
Entry.EnglishText: You have good Gajuma with you. They look so distinguished and easy to use.

Entry.JapaneseText: ワン！
Entry.EnglishText: Woof!

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアというヒューマの娘を 見かけたらすぐに教えてくれ。 隠し立てするとためにならないぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you happen to see a Huma girl named Claire, please inform me immediately. There's no use hiding her.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今は国中が混乱している…… 中でも、ミナールの種族対立は 激化しているらしい。
Entry.EnglishText: This country is in utter chaos... Especially in Minal, the hostility there has grown even more intense.

Entry.JapaneseText: 人の往来が多い場所だけに、 一日も早い治安回復が望まれる……
Entry.EnglishText: I hope that everything will calm down as soon as possible since it's a port town.

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナール……
Entry.EnglishText: Minal...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマどもは、軍と言えど、 我々ヒューマの言う事に 決して従おうとしない。
Entry.EnglishText: Gajuma, even those in the military, never want to listen to what we Huma say.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今度何かあれば、 武力衝突は避けられない かもしれない……
Entry.EnglishText: If something happens again, we might not be able to avoid coming into conflict...

Entry.JapaneseText: 何が起こるかわからない。 どこか安全な場所へ 避難したほうがいいぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: You don't know what might happen, so it's best to evacuate to some place safe.

Entry.JapaneseText: ミール広場が避難所になっている。 ここは我々に任せて避難を！
Entry.EnglishText: Mir Square has been converted to an evacuation center. Please head there and leave this town to us!

Entry.JapaneseText: 治安が乱れている。 街を歩く時は注意するんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Security is in disarray. Please be careful when walking around the city.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……話しかけないで。 用があるなら、あんたの ご主人様を通しなさい！
Entry.EnglishText: Don't talk to me. Go bother your master if you need anything.

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょっとあんた、 ガジュマと一緒に 何やってるの？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, you, what do you think you're doing, mingling with Gajuma?

Entry.JapaneseText: ここはヒューマの街よ。 いくら召使いと言っても、 ガジュマなんか連れ歩かないで！
Entry.EnglishText: This is a Huma town. I don't care how many servants you have, just don't go walking around with Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマのくせに、 高そうな服を来た子だね。 盗んだんじゃないだろうね！
Entry.EnglishText: Those are some fancy clothes for a Gajuma. Now where did you steal them from?

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマが 話しかけるんじゃないよ！ まったく不愉快だね！
Entry.EnglishText: Don't talk to me, Gajuma! Ugh... what an unpleasant bunch...

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたの連れのガジュマ、 ずいぶん偉そうね！
Entry.EnglishText: That Gajuma you have with you sure looks snobby.

Entry.JapaneseText: 召使いなんでしょ？ もっとヒューマに対して 控えめにするよう、 しつけなさいよね！
Entry.EnglishText: Isn't she supposed to be your servant? You should train them to be more discreet.

Entry.JapaneseText: おや、あなたたち なかなかお似合いねー！
Entry.EnglishText: Oh my, you both look so good together!

Entry.JapaneseText: やっぱり、ヒューマって ガジュマと違って、 美しくて絵になるわねえー。
Entry.EnglishText: I mean it's a given, considering that unlike Gajuma, Huma actually are capable of elegance and beauty.
Entry.Notes: original tl: "as I thought, huma look much better than Gajuma." deepL: After all, Huma are different from Gajuma, Unlike Gajuma, Huma are beautiful and picturesque. So I kinda workshopped it a bit. lemme know what you think.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマが 話しかけるんじゃないよ！ まったく不愉快だね！
Entry.EnglishText: Don't talk to me, Gajuma! Ugh... what an unpleasant bunch...

Entry.JapaneseText: スカラベさんのお宅の ほうが騒がしいわね。 何かあったのかしら？
Entry.EnglishText: There's a lot of ruckus around Lord Scarabe's house. I wonder what's going on?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あんたも、話し合いの件に 一枚かんでるんじゃないだろうね。 その顔……まったく腹立たしい……
Entry.EnglishText: I sure hope you're not taking part in the discussion. That ugly mug of yours is pissing me the hell off.

Entry.JapaneseText: 明日、ヒューマとガジュマの 話し合いが行われるんですってね！ ガジュマが街に来るなんて 耐えられないわ！
Entry.EnglishText: So the Huma and Gajuma are going to hold a discussion tomorrow. Oooh, but I can't stand seeing Gajuma in this town!

Entry.JapaneseText: 私は見たわよ…… あんたがヒューマばかり 殴ってたのをね……
Entry.EnglishText: I saw you... You were beating up those Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王様を助けたからって、 いい気にならないで！
Entry.EnglishText: Don't get full of yourself just because you managed to save the Queen!

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、あんたはヒューマだから わかるわよね……？ スカラベ様は悪くない…… 悪いのはガジュマよ……！
Entry.EnglishText: You're a Huma so you must understand, right? Lord Scarabe has done nothing wrong! It's all the Gajuma's fault!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマの分際で、 話しかけるんじゃないわよ！ あっち行って！
Entry.EnglishText: Don't talk to me about Gajuma's social standing or whatever. Go bother someone else!

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、ガジュマたちが強気で、 調子に乗ってるのよ！ 私たちヒューマの言う事も 聞きやしないのよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Those Gajuma have grown brash! They haven't been listening to what we tell them...

Entry.JapaneseText: 軍の人たちはヒューマばかり 監視してるし…… ああ、腹立たしいわ……！
Entry.EnglishText: And the military's just keeping a really close eye on us Huma... Ugh... It's so frustrating!

Entry.JapaneseText: 国の偉い人が何て言ったか 知らないけどね…… 私はガジュマなんかに 負けやしないんだからね！
Entry.EnglishText: I have no idea what this country's officials are saying, but I have no intentions on kneeling before Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、ガジュマたちが強気で、 調子に乗ってるのよ！ 私たちヒューマの言う事も 聞きやしないのよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Those Gajuma have grown brash! They haven't been listening to what we tell them...

Entry.JapaneseText: 軍の人たちはヒューマばかり 監視してるし…… ああ、腹立たしいわ……！
Entry.EnglishText: And the military's just keeping a really close eye on us Huma... Ugh... It's so frustrating!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ああ……ガジュマの事は 腹立たしい事ばっか！
Entry.EnglishText: Ughhh... It's always Gajuma this, Gajuma that... I'm so sick of it all!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマはガジュマより 素晴らしい種族なの。 それをよく考えてみて。
Entry.EnglishText: Huma are far superior to the Gajuma. Take that to heart.
